Author: lovelylayout
Text: Oof. The answer about being at the hairdresser's and not being able to look in the mirror got me. All through high school, every time I got my hair cut, the lady would have to keep telling me not to move my head, because I'd lower my eyes and my head would drift along with it. This might still be an issue of mine, I haven't had a haircut in something like 18 months. Hmm. Maybe I should try doing that.
